airport_data.sub_header: Upon arrival, please exit from arrival gate 3A-3B, across the road you can spot BOI ATM, just beside the ATM there is walkway for car parking, walk till pillar no. G-176 and turn right and walk to another 50 meters, the car should be parked in the vicinity.

pickup_data.header: I'll pick up the car myself
pickup_data.sub_header: Nearest Zoomcar site is $distance km away from the $terminal

hd_data.sub_header: Car will be delivered at the address you will provide
